tweet: Dragged to Makkro 's shopping when would much rather be home writing. Cost me. Still now stocked freezer & booze cupboard ready for Xmas.
Least one thing with all this rain - Keeps me indoors except have to venture out to have swine flu jab. Feel a coffee cake need approaching.
Pacifying miserable hubby. Sky HD box packed up last night. He's not amused.
Gloomy day today in more ways than just the weather. Retiring to bed with a book and brandy and fond memories of one who shall be missed.
@AliBacon My wireless mouse ate new batteries monthly. Keyboard batteries lasted over 2 years! Have you checked remote sensor working okay
